title: 150. Restaurant Industry Winners and Losers of 2020 Impacting 2021
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Fred LeFranc, the chief executive officer and chaos strategist for Results Thru Strategy. Barron and LeFranc explore the brand successes and failures of 2020, and what that means for restaurants in 2021.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
